actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to protect the public health and welfare by providing for the inspection of imported dairy products and by requiring that such products comply with certain minimum standards for sanitation and that the dairy farms on which milk is produced and the plants in which such products are produced meet certain minimum standards of sanitation.

summary.text: Dairy Import Sanitation Act - Provides for the inspection of imported dairy products in order to protect the public health and welfare. Requires that such products comply with minimum standards for sanitation established by the Secretary of Agriculture and that the dairy farms on which milk is produced and the plants in which such products are produced meet minimum standards of sanitation. States that such standards shall be comparable to the standards of purity, wholesomeness, and sanitation recommended by the Secretary for domestic dairy products. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the administration and supervision of the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to protect the public health and welfare by providing for the inspection of imported dairy products and by requiring that such products comply with certain minimum standards for sanitation and that the dairy farms on which milk is produced and the plants in which such products are produced meet certain minimum standards of sanitation.
